name: Side Swap 2D: Endless Fun
summary:
Side Swap 2D is an Exciting Arcade Game where you have to dodge the obstacles by switching sides! Do you think you can beat it?
Tap the screen to swap direction and dodge all of the endless obstacles ahead. Can you beat the high score?
As you tap you will swap directions, overtime the game gets faster and harder, but never touch the obstacles or it's all over!
